text:

author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Khandu bhaiiiiii!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™  First year se lagta hai ki bc, ye bandaa kitna mehnat karta hai yaar!ğŸ˜œ  First year me to apan jyada jaante hi nahi the ek-doosre ko, kyoki bc tu room me kam or Library/CC/RM/or kahi(itne hi jagah ke naam pta hai), me hi rhta tha ğŸ˜‚(JK bhai, teri mehnat dekh ke to abhi bhi inspiration milti hai â¤ï¸). Hmaara first time sahi se interaction Mussoorie ki trip pe hi hua tha or tum hmaare bhaii-jaan ban gaye ğŸ¤—ğŸ˜‚ , us se pahle to bas normally milte the, kyoki TU MERI wing me rhta tha ! Or rishikesh me jo tune dive lgaai thi bhai raft se  oh ho ho hoooooo ğŸ˜‚, ek side se ghus ke doosri side se nikalne wali, Mujhe to lgaa bc gayab khaa ho gayaa tu!
Apni saath me memories pta nahi itni kam kyo hai bhai, par jitni hai, pen se bnai gayi line ki tarah solid hai ekdum, chah kar bhi bhool nahi paunga me kabhi!ğŸ˜ I wish ki humne or bhi jyada time saath me bakchodi ki hoti par abhi bahut lambi life baaki hai! Tu bas US ki trip sponser kar dena! ğŸ˜ğŸ¤£  Apne 6 bhaiyo ke baad saatwa bhai hai tu! 

Bas RR kam karde thoda or RR ko full support start kar de(yamak alankaar)! Baki to chill banda hai or bahut humble bhi or aaj tak jab bhi jarurat padi hai hamesha help ki hai tune <3, me duaa karunga ki bumble or tinder par tujhe bakchod matches milte rhe US jake! USA jake bhool mat jana.

Bakchod to tu hai hi, Baaki to ab aise hi chaapte rhein , bakchodi karte rhein or bas dosti asie hi bnaye rkhein!! Me dinesh bhakar(iyo) aapse fir milta rhunga fir kisi nayi jagah, fir kuchh naye kisse, kuchh nayi yaadein bnane ke liye, tab tak ...Yahin hoon me, yahin hoon meâ€¦ kahi na gayaa tujhe chhorke me! â¤ï¸ â¤ï¸

text:
Bhai yaar mishra tu itna cool banda kaise hai!!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™(Words kafi nahi hai teri coolness describe karne ke liye). First year me, kitna chhota baccha lagta tha bhai, bilkul seedha, sacha or sudhraa hua, bilkul pure as a crystal. Gaali nahi dene ke liye, apne chacha ne kitni maari thi bhai teri! Or Roj subah pooja karna, mujhe lgaa bhai mere se jyada seedha kon aa gayaa yha!! ğŸ˜‚
PUBG khelne ke liye tera room hi shift kar diya tha bhai almost, bura to nahi hi lgaa hoga?!! Kyoki waise bhi tu rhta to tha nahi room me, bas sone ke liye aata tha!ğŸ™„
Cards khelna to tujhe abhi bhi nahi aata or bhai lionel mishra ban ne me bhi bahut time or mehnat lagne wali hai, par bhai tere saath football khelne me hi sabse jyada maje aate the, confidence aa jata tha na yaar ki mujhse bekaar bhi koi khelta hai!!ğŸ˜œ
Lockdown wale summer me or DSA me bhai tune itni help ki thi yaar, bas tere or ritesh ki wajah se utna sab ho paya tha mujhse. Warna to bc DS hi paas nahi ho pata bhai!  Or bhai Tune Mitsubishi ke intern wale interview wale din bhi to bhai itna help kiya tha bhai, tu or ritesh to itna serious or concerned the bhai mujhe lgaa ki bc me khud itna tension kyo nahi le rha!!ğŸ¤£ ğŸ˜
Ab to tu bhi PUBG khelne lag gayaa bhai chal khelnege is baar, PUBG, Brawl, AmongUs kuchh to khel le bhai, bhayankar bore ho rhe! Ab to phone bhi aa gayaa mere paas!! ğŸ™ƒ
Sab log kitne maje lete rhte the yaar tere par sab jokes ko tu itna sportingly leta tha tu, tere upar joke karna aasan tha par bhai tu har joke ko itne maje me leta bas isiliye karta tha mein to, tu hi tha jiske paas reply bhi nahi hota tha or bura bhi nahi maanta tha bhaiğŸ˜œ
Itna chill banda hai tu bhai ki tere saath rehke koi bore to nahi ho sakta ye me surely keh sakta hu!
Bas bhai aise hi cool or mast rehna yaar, kitna likhu bhai, last year ka ye ek month to epic tha yaar,words me likh hi nahi sakta!!! kitne maje kiye saath me, sab likhne lagunga to page bhar jaye sab Poker, cards se lekar football or badminton, bhai yaar tere saath itna maje aate the yaar, abhi bhi sochta hu jhaa tu hota tha wo moment funny hota hi tha, kabhi aisa hua hi nahi hi tu kahi present ho or mahaul boring ho jaye!!ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤—
Bahut jyada achhe dost nahi hai mere IITK me jinko bhai bol saku, par Iâ€™m happy ki tu unme se ek hai bhai, Love you bhai bas milte rhna yaar or itna bdaa friend circle hai tera to bhool mat jana BC! Google me bhi aise hi chaapte rhna bhai!! â¤ï¸
Bas ek or baat, Tu yaar mota hi rhna, patla hoke cute nahi lagega itna! Or mujhe abhi bhi dimpression hota hai, in case you wanna help somehow (Please bhai, tujhe pta hai na kaise?), patla ho gayaa to wo kaise door hoga bhai ğŸ˜‚â¤ï¸
Mere Whatsapp ki bakwas se pareshaan to nahi hota na!!???ğŸ˜‚
Bahut kuchh hai bhai likhne ko to or bhi but sab feelings ko words justify nahi kar sakte!! Aur ye sach hai bhai, bas ek random line nahi hai ye! Ritesh or shashank ke baad tu sabse jyada best dost hai mera IITK ka bhai!! â¤ï¸

PS: tujhe trip pe chalna chahiye tha bhai, bahut maje aate yaar ğŸ˜’ ab koi or trip plan karo yaar jaldi ye corona khatam hote hi!! please !!
Or haa yaar:
Ronaldo is far far better than messi, bc keh diya na bas keh diya!! ğŸ˜
RCB bas isiliye IPL nahi jeet rhi kyoki tu support karta hai!!ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

text:
Or bhaiii DeepRaja chakradhari!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Starting me to apni jyada baatein hoti nahi thi. Saale tu PE ke liye tak nahi jagaata tha time pe chutiya!!ğŸ™„ Apna main interaction to games ke through hi hua tha bhai, COD MW2 to bhai first year mene tere dabbe me khel khel ke hi pura kiya tha!! Fir bhai PUBG to kya khela tha yaar humne techriti ke 4 din, bas 24hrs tere room me hi pade rehte the, Uske baad exams tak me nahi ruke the!!! Mishra ka to room almost shift hi kar diya tha us chakkar me!!!ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Us time to pure noob the bhai par fir bhi best experience tha PUBG khelne ka. 
Fir to bhai roj saath canteen or games ke suggestions chalte hi rhte the bhai, haa khele nahi mene jyada games, wo baat alag hai!!!ğŸ˜ PUBG ke baad blackpink 2nd best cheej introduce ki thi bhai tune, fir carryminati ki videos saath dekhna or games ke trailers!!! Koi technical problem ho to first banda tu hi yaad aata tha bhai, laptop ho ya mobile. Bhai tere saath jitna time spend hota tha, 1% bhi waste nahi lgaa aaj tak, pura quality time tha bhaiâ¤ï¸ğŸ¤— 
Lockdown ke baad to apna memes exchange hi bas mast time pass hota tha bhai! Or dual na karwana best decisions me se ek tha bhai, warna to bure fass jate aap !!
Tu bhai akela aisa banda hai jo lockdown bhi aise maje me nikal deta hai, or saale bakchod to tu hai bas bahar dikhata nahi hai, seedha banda bnaa rehta hai!! ğŸ˜œBas hune saathme nashe nahi kiye bhai, wo bas baki reh gaye karne yaar!! 
Ab bombay jaake gurukul ka student hi mat reh jaana saale, thrill lana thoda life me, bas games hi mat khelte rhna bhai. Ha but PS5 to le lena, time mila to weekends pe khelenge kabhi!! Baki games ke suggestions to me lete hi rhunga, khelunga ya nahi wo to nahi pta! ğŸ˜‚
Bas aise hi chaapte rehna bhai, Hmaari sab baate bhai bakchodi me hi nikal jaati hai bhai, bas touch me rhna bhai whatsapp par baate to chalti ho rhegi apni !! â¤ï¸
PS: Whatsapp par aise hi bakchod stuff share karte rehna!

Or â€˜Saangriâ€™ or â€˜Kerâ€™ bhej diya kar kabhi kabhi, bas status lgaane se kuchh nahi milega!ğŸ˜‚ Rajasthan ke log bakchod to hote hi hai, to uska to kehna hi kya!
Best of luck bhai! Maje karna, paani ki jarurat pade to le jaana chahe! â¤ï¸
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or Mukesh bhai! Football thoda aaram se khela kar bhai!ğŸ˜ Jitna time saath me spend kiya, itna to samajh aa gaya ki â€˜Bihari babuâ€™ kya hota hai! Judge nahi kar rha par, bakchod, cool, chutiya, chill, gyaani or bhi bahut kuchh ke liye â€˜Bihariâ€™ se better koi single word ho hi nahi sakta!ğŸ™ƒğŸ˜œ  Kabhi kabhi lagta hai ki kaas me bhi bihari hota bhai, daaru ban hai but paani to milta! Ek hi din dekha tha bhai jyada to, par cards me itna kon rota hai yaar! ğŸ˜‚
But bhai aise hi bakchod or cool bane rhna! Chaapte rhna jhaa bhi jao, jo bhi karo bhai! Best of luck or milte rhenge vrooo! â¤ï¸
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or Nitik bhai!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Kaam to bahut aaya bhai tu, jab bhi jarurat padi thi or bahut padi thi!ğŸ˜ Bas mech or uske kuchh â€˜jerkâ€™ profs ko gaaliya jaroor di saath me humne jab bhi mile hai! Chahe exams ke time kabhi- kabhi lybrary ya kisi ke room pe ho, Ya fir shashank ya mishra ke room pe bakchodi!ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… Baki bhai chaapu to tu hai hi, aur bakait to hum first year ke first day HALL2 milte hi ban gaye the! Jo trips ke plan bas group ban ke reh gaye hai, unko pura karte hai bhai ab kabhi! Mech ko gaaliya to wha bhi denge pakka!ğŸ™„ğŸ¤£ 
PS: KKR don't deserve your support ğŸ˜’ RR ko support karo bhai(Iske reasons ki koi jarurat nahi hai)!!!
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or NANA!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Jyada bate huyi nahi apni par bhai teri smile epic lagti hai, I wish mere paas bhi hoti utni charming and pure smile!!ğŸ˜ğŸ¤£  itna to pta chal gayaa ki bahut chill and chaapu banda hai tu! Thoda or saath rhte kaash bhai, or assignment share karte or jyada gaaliya dete mech ko to or bahut likhta! But jitna bhi mila ho time saath me hume, tu yaad hamesha rhega! ğŸ¤—
Bas aise hi muskurate rhna bhai, or milte rhenge kabhi na kabhi, kahi na kahi jaroor, jindagi me kisi dagar par chalte chalte! â¤ï¸
Best of luck NANA, bhai ko yaad rakh lena or jarurat pade to yaad kar bhi lena bhai!â¤ï¸
Or haa aayenge teri shaadi ka tamasha dekhne, bas yaad se bula lena yaad se!
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or pranjal bhai!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Mech ke assignments karte karte hi mile the bhai, or wahi karte karte itna door bhi ho gaye! Par tune 689 me bahut help ki thi bhai yaar, assignments se lekar forum pe bakchodi tak!ğŸ˜ Mech ke professors ko gaaliya dete rhenge chahe kahi chale jaaye!ğŸ˜‚
Aise hi help karte rehna bhai logo ki and Best of luck ! Chaapte rhna â¤ï¸
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or bhai prashant!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ College aane ke baad bhai kabhi mile hi nahi hum log yaar-  Bahut ajeeb baat hai yaar pta nahi kaise!ğŸ˜’ Apni yadein jyada nhi, apni baate jyada nhi, mulakate jyada nhi, sath me kiye aise kaam bhi jyada nhi. Par jitni bhi baate ki tujhse, bahut mast banda hai bhai tu! Bahut humble  or kind bhi! ğŸ˜
First year me mile the, or fir 3rd year ke end me! Bahut improve kiya hai bhai tune, bahut mehanat ki hai! Aise hi karte rhna! ğŸ™ƒ
Dunia bahut chhoti hai bhai, fir milenge or jaroor milenge us din hall2 ke phatta ground ki tarah kisi din, achanak, kisi anjaan jagah, kisi anjaan raste par! Bas is baar bahut maje karenge, bahut baatein hongi, bahut yaadein bhi hongi! ğŸ˜œ
Tab tak best of luck bhai, aise hi chaapte rehna or hamesha touch me rhna! Yaad karte rhna bhai! â¤ï¸
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text: Kuchh khaa pee liya kar bc !
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Pratyush bhai kitni bakchodi karta tha yaar tu first year me, room se bahar aake doosri wing walo ko gaaliya dene lagta tha fir wapas room me jake pdaa rhta thağŸ¤£ Teri or amitesh ki bakchodiya to alag level, fir chutiyo ki tarah room me adh-nanga pdaa rhta tha bc! Sahi me 
bahut chutiya lagta tha bhai! ğŸ˜œğŸ˜œ
Tere Bâ€™day par GPL lena sabse aasan hota tha, bc uthao or maaro, wing me sabse jyada GPL teri hi huyi hogi na?
Har saal ka same scene tha tera bc: Canteen jaane ke liye puchho to lodu biscuits lane ko bol deta tha,Isliye bc jyada puchhta hi nahi tha me to ğŸ˜‚ 
Jitna bhi chutiya bol le sab yaar tujhe( jo ki tu hai bhi), par tu dil ka bahut seedha banda hai bhai, sabse mast baat karna(Agar koi room me aa jaye to, kyoki bahar to tu jata hi nahi room se), pyaar se rhta tha, haa bas tera pyaar dikhane ka tareeka alag tha(gaaliya dena)ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, isliye bahut log samajh nahi paate the!! Mishra se to kabhi nahi banegi teri! 
Bahut chiil banda hai yaar tu or bahut jyadaa mehanati bhi, kabhi kuchh personally nahi liya or Itna genuine or clear banda hai bhai, jo andar hai wahi bahar dikahta hai, kuchh fake nahi, bilkul pure! ~ kuchh jyada hi tareef ho gayi!â¤ï¸  Dekh bhai bura man maan na par chutiya to tu abhi bhi hai!! ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ˜
Bas room se nikal kar thode maje lena start kar bhai, room me baithe baithe kya ukhaad lega bhai!! college ka kitna time to tune bas room me nikaal diya tha bc! ğŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸
Bas aage bhi chaapte rhna or bhai ko yaad rkhna bc! Galti se bhi bhool na jana! Oe BC jaldi shaadi karle or jalool jalool bulana! Baki to bhai fir mil jayenge kahi! Gaaliya dete or Bakchodiyan karte!â¤ï¸

text:
Or be pappu bencho!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Mujhe to yaad bhi nahi apan first time mile kaise the, Or fir  Assignment chhapte or mechanical ko gaaliya dete dete kab 4 saal nikal gaye pta hi nahi chalaa! First year me to apan jaante bhi nahi the ek doosre ko dhang se: â€˜Who r u, bc kon h re tuâ€. Fir 2nd year me PUBG saath me khelte the, or tu itna ganda khelta tha bhaii, par mera sahi tha, noobdo ke saath khel khel ke apne aap ko pro samajhta tha!! Pubg se to tujhe ye itna cute nickname, pappu yadav mila na! ğŸ¤£
2nd or 3rd year me to bas coding or apps hi bnata rhta tha bc, or fir assignment ke liye rota rhta tha! 
â€œPappu bsdk coding hi karta rhega kyaâ€
â€œJake coding karo beta, or kuchh nahi hona tumseâ€
Ye sun sun ke pak to bahut gayaa hoga tu! Par tu deserve bhi karta tha bhai!
Or fir last year ke ye 40 din to bhai, college ke best dino me the! Tu room se bahar bhi nikla, coding bhi kam kar di, badminton, football, cards, poker, mafia! Sab khelna start kar diya bc! Wo baat alag hai kisi me bhi tu mujhse achha nahi tha par Iâ€™m happy ki teri wo buri lat chhoot gayi coding ki! ğŸ˜œğŸ˜‚
Or us din cold drink ka taste kaisa lgaa tha! BC pura chura khatam kar diya tha! 
Kabhi apne aap bhi call kar liya kar bhai, bc tu call nahi karta milega to kya ghanta hi! 
Ab kya likhu isme bc, 3saal tak coding or thodi si pubg ke alawa kahi dikhta hi nahi tha tu! 
Bas bhai mehnat karte rehna aise hi, chaap to tu dega hi! Milete rhenge bc kabhi na kabhi, kahi na kahi! Agar tu room se bahar nikla, coding chhor ke to! â¤ï¸
Bas ab jaldi se shaadi karle ek Sundar si ladki se,(sundar hona important hai) or mujhe 5 din pahle bulana bc! 
PS: mere bina reh pana jyada muskil to nahi ho rha? Or cricket players ke naam yaad kar le ab.ğŸ˜‚
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or bhai jindalll! ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ First or second year me to bas tujhe aise jaante the ki bhai ritesh ke saath rhta hai tu! Us ke baad football saath khelne lage bhai, thoda dheere bhaga kar mc! Mostly opposite teams me hi rhte the, kyoki do best players kabhi same team me nahi khel sakte ğŸ˜œ!!
Trip pe to kya hi maje kiye the bhai, wo baatein to hamesha yaad aati rhengi! Uske baad to online games, football, badminton or bas aise hi dheere dheere tu mere liye, Rahul jindal se  master, mikasa or jindal bhai ban gayaa ! ğŸ˜
Last year me to ritesh or mishra ke hi room pe pade rhte the! Or badminton, football, cards, mafia, poker se lekar daaru- sutta or maal sab kiya hai bhai saath me!!
Us din to bhai ritesh or mishra ko kitna pareshan kiya yaar subah breakfast se pahle, becharo ko sone hi nahi diya! ğŸ¤£
Itna chilled out or charming banda hai bhai tu, aise hi bakchodi karte rhna or online game nikalo bhai koi khelne layak saath, kyoki PUBG to tu khelega nahi hmaare saath! ğŸ™ƒ
Bas bhai aise hi chaapte rhna, bakchod rhna or tarak mehta dekhta rhna abhi bhi( lol ye baat yaad hai first year ki teri pta nahi kaise!!!)ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… Chill karna bhai!! Fir raste milenge or un raston par girte-uthte, chalte ya udte huye hum bhi honge! Bhoolna mat bas!! â¤ï¸
Or mene suna hai Punjabi shaadiya bahut bakchod hoti hai, Punjabi wedding me ladkiya pat-ti hai, daaru chalti hai, khuli bat-ti hai !! 
bulana bhool mat jana bhai galti se bhi!!! â¤ï¸ğŸ˜‚

Bahut jyada bolta bhi nahi, or bahar kabhi dikha nahi yaar, warna to baate hoti or bhi! Best of luck bhai, Jo bhi karo chaapte rhna bas yahi dua hai!! â¤ï¸

Fir last year me to bhai kya nahi kiya humne saath me! Poker, cards se lekar peene, fookne tak sab bhai!ğŸ˜ Shakal se bhale hi thoda serious or chutiya lagta ho bhai par tu hai bakchod or chaapu!ğŸ˜œ Bas aise hi chaapte rhna bhai or milte rhenge kabhi na kabhi, kahi na kahi bhai!â¤ï¸

text:
Or bhai pant!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Bahut jyada apni baate huyi nahi, kyoki baki log lage rhte the teri lene me!ğŸ˜… Tere kaarnaame to bas sune hi jyada hai mene, ab yha bolne layak nahi hai!ğŸ˜œ Bahut bhola reh gayaa bhai tu or saale call or games beech me chhor ke jana band kar de! Or ghar pe bol ki thoda privacy de tujhe!ğŸ™„ Btw dance bahut achha karta hai tu, peene ke baad to or bhi jyada!! 
Umeed karta hu ki tujhe apna french kiss jaldi mile or aage se tere room mates sote huye teri baate na sune! ğŸ¤£
Baki bhai be bakchod or thoda chill kar bc, warna to or koi bhi nahi milegi!! 
Best of luck, fir milenge chalte chalte !!â¤ï¸
PS: Cricket to me tere se bahut achha khelta hu!

author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
#DRS is Lob#
Or bhai Riteshhh!!!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Mera IITK ka first dost tu hi tha bhai! First day tha or mujhe to bahut ajeeb sa lag rha tha, ghar se first time itna door aaya tha to samajh nahi aa rha tha ki aage kya hoga, fir tujhse mila room me, or tune bola ki chal ghoom ke aate hai bahar, bhai itna achha lgaa ki yaar chalo apne IITK ka first friend to mil gayaa wo bhi itna sahi banda hai yaar mast!ğŸ¤—â¤ï¸  Mera first sem to bhai tune hi nikalwaya pura, na mujhe english aati thi bilkul or fir class me bhi ghanta kuchh samajh nahi aata tha, tu bhai Phy ke MTH ke sab questions btata tha, or bhai endsem se pahle  5 din puri bio padhai bhai tune(mujhe to umeed bhi nahi thi bilkul)! Mere bday ka dance or HSS ki class, PE miss karwane ki kosis aur summer me uske bday pe ki huyi saajish. Yahi sab me, 2nd year itni jaldi aa gayaa pta hi nahi chalaa. ğŸ˜
Mussoorie ki trip pe kitne maje kiye the bhai, kaise tu uthne se pahle hi fresh rhta tha samajh nahi aaya mujhe abhi tak!!ğŸ˜‚ Or haa â€œItni chhoti si chot ke liye kitna royega bhaiâ€ - ye words to yaad hi honge!!!ğŸ¤£  Uske baad to bilkul shaant bc!! Fir jump wale time pe bhai jake baith gayaa yaar, mujhe bc hasi aa rhi tujhe dekh ke or fatt rhi thi soch ke ki agla number mera hi tha!ğŸ˜‚
DS ke assignments me teri help to bhai itni jaroori thi, mujhe to kuchh aata nahi tha or tere or mishra ke bharose liya tha ki tum log help ar doge or tumne to bhai itna chill kar diya tha assignment karna yaarrr kya hi bolu me! 
Mitsubishi ki intern ke interview ke time bhai,, mein abhi bhi believe nahi kar pa rha ki tum log kitne jyada concerned ho gaye the bhai tu or missu, or mujhe kuchh samajh hi nahi aa rha tha ki karu kya me! Fati padi thi bhai buri tarah meri toğŸ˜‚, tu hi saath bhi gayaa tha bhai or itna support kiya tha!! â¤ï¸
Jha bhi jarurat padi bhai tune har jagah best advice di mujhe, summer me teri help ke bina kuchh ho hi nahi pata bhai, bilkul zero confidence se shuru kiya tha yaar par tune meri har chutiya si galti ko itne aaram se btaya bhai, tumhare liye hmaare mann me ijjat bahut jyada badh gayi thi itni jyada like dinosaur bhai!ğŸ˜…  
Abhi last ke 1 month ka to kya hi likhu bhai, jab me quarantine me tha tab bhi tere se hi baat hoti thi bhai, fir bahar aake to bhai tere room pe hi rhte the pure time, apne room to basa sone ke liye jaata tha meğŸ˜…, football, badminton, cards, poker, mafiaâ€¦.. Kya kya nahi kiya yaar apan ne saath me, uske baare me to likh hi nahi sakta me!!
Ab aise likhta rahu to shayad kabhi ye sab khatam hi na ho par bhai, par jitna bhi likhu bhai kam hi lagega sab!! ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ
Bas aise hi mast rhna bhai, aise hi haste rehna, muskurate rehna, aage bhi aise hi chaapte rhna bhai! Milte to rhenge hi bhai, teri help ki jarurat to mujhe padti hi rhegi, kabhi meri pade (4 saal me hua to aisa par fir bhi) to bas ek call bhaiâ¤ï¸

author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
#DRS is Lob#
Ye Meri usual bato ki tarah funny to nahi hoga bhai, kyoki, â€œJindagi pyaar ka geet haiâ€, jo hamne 4 saal saath itne maje me gaya hai or ab yha pe usi geet ka saaransh likhne ki kosis ki hai, chahe shabd or lines achhe ho ya na ho par feeling to bilkul pure hai bhai Unme!!â¤ï¸
Or Bhai mote!!!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ samajh nahi aa rha tha khaa se shuru karu or kya kya likhu, to bas shuru kar deta hu jo bhi dimag me aa rha!!  IITK ka naam sunte hi sabse pahla banda dimaag me aata hai tu, or yaad aata hai wahi Room: B223,ğŸ˜ bhai jahaa se is roller-coaster safar ki shuruaat huyi or bas fir to us room se lekar hall9 ke terrace ki â€˜Sintexâ€™ ki tanki tak or fir hall 9 ke gateğŸ¥º tak ka safar sirf lafjo me keh pana possible nahi hai! Tujhe or apni IITK ki best memories ko alag alag kaise karu bhai, bc sab me tu to hota hi tha!!â¤ï¸
First year me to kya bakchodi karte the bhai, BC apna room adda tha sabke rone, hasne, naachne, gaane sabka! Aise hi bakchodiyo me first year to nikal gayaa bhai! Or 2nd year me ladaai bhi ho gayi, itne regret tha bhai us baat ka to, bc wo sabse bekar dino me se the IITK me mere.ğŸ˜ğŸ˜‚
Mussoorie ki trip pe bhai kitne maje kiye yaar saath me, george everest pe kutte wala incident to abhi bhi yaad aata hai to hasi aa jati hai,ğŸ˜‚ bhai or plan karo yaar koi trip, ye covid khatam hote hi!!!
Mishra ke room pe mishra ki lete rhna, saath me movie dekhna or vijit ke room pe antakshari or dumb charades ya rishu ke room pe bhooto ki kahaniya, bhai kya hi maje aate the yaar. 
Fir pura lockdown to tere se chat karte karte hi nikal gayaa, kyoki tujhe papa ka business bhi to sambhalna hota tha to call nahi karte the jyada,ğŸ˜… faltu bakwas or IPL ki teams bnana, football me mujhe ghanta kuchh ata pta tha par aise hi chutiyapa karna cricket se lekar life tak ki har chhoti chhoti cheeje discuss karte rhna kaise bhool sakta hu yaar me! Sab franchise ko hume hire karna chahiye bc, unse achhi team to hum Whatsapp pe bna dete the!!!ğŸ˜‚
Ab last year ke baare me to bhai kya hi bolu, ek ek moment yaadgaar tha ye last ke ek month ka to!! Dominos se lekar chaupati tak or MT se lekar OAT tak !! kitne chakkar lgaate the last year me aise hi ki bhaai patla ho jaye kaise bhi karke. Ab bsdk ghar pe mota mat ho jana, warna wo steps pure karne ki mehnat barbaad ho jayegi.ğŸ™„
Kabhi bhi, kahi bhi, kisi bhi cheej me confusion ho ya jarurat ho bhai tu sabse pahle yaad aata hai, or aaj tak to aisa hua nahi ki tu bilkul bhi help na kar paya ho!! Bhai mujhe khud se jyada bharosa to tere pe hota hai abhi bhi, and you know it!! Mails ke reply tak tune likeh hai bc mere!!ğŸ˜‚
Kabhi sochta hu ki tu or ritesh nahi hote first year me to kya hota abhi mera, bilkul blank ho jata hu bhai, kuchh sochna chahta hi nahi tum logo ke bina IITK ke baare me to! Tum dono best roomates the bhai IITK ke. ğŸ¤—ğŸ˜
Kafi genuine banda hai bhai tu, kabhi kuchh fake nahi kiya, gussa bhi hota tha naraj bhi par bas kuchh time ke liye, mat-bhed bahut the har cheej me apne par mann-bhed kabhi nahi hua. Bas bhai first year me PE miss karwane ki kosis se lekar last year tak life me jo kuchh bhi paya har jagah tu saath tha bhai. 
Kabhi notice kiya nahi par bc tu kitna jyada multi talented banda hai be, bc cheating se lekar cricket, football ka saara gyaan, or likhta to kya gajab hai mkccc!!! Ab bhai bas mumbai me bakchod open mic performance chahiye, apne adhure pyaar ki daastan ab dunia ke saamne rkh de bhai!!

Likhne ko to itna hai ki words kam pad jayenge bhai, par ab bas kuchh lines likhi hai, achhi lage to best hai warna is memoir ki fourth line padh lena...ğŸ˜‚
â€œFirst year ke golgappe-momos se bhutte tak, 
Or last year me daaru - sutte tak,
Second year ki Ldaai tak,
Or har bakchodi ke baad bole â€˜Are bhai-bhaiâ€™ tak,
Lockdown me bhi bas apna whatsapp discussion tha,
Or bas yahi to 4 saal ka jeevan tha!!â€ 

Kuchh - kuchh in gaano si gujri hai apni life in chaar years me, kuchh - kuchh :)
Started from here in first year:) 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oSrH1UHHeg8
Then 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EatzcaVJRMs
fir
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tkvAU0fsFIw
Or ab finally bhai, from now on, always:::::: Jaldi milenge â¤ï¸
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rORll5QUXzI

PS: RR > >RCB, thanks :)
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Or shailabh bhai!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Ye shashank naam ke log sab hi bakchod hote hai kya, kahi na kahi!ğŸ˜œ Prayas me mile the hum first time or jitne logo se prayas ki wajah se mila hu me, sab ke sab chaapu bhai! Or tum to bakchod ho hi!  Ab paiso ke pichhe bhagna kam karo thoda, kisi gareeb ke liye bhi chhor do!ğŸ˜‚ 
Bas aise hi chaapte rhna, best of luck bhaiâ¤ï¸
author: Dinesh  Bhakar

text:
Yo vijju boi!ğŸ¤˜ğŸ¤™ Nahi ab mota nahi bolunga! First year me tere room me CS:GO wali hoodie dekh ke lgaa ki bhai ye to bakchod gamer hoga (abhi bhi mujhe lagta hai ki tune wo kisi turnament me hi jeeti thi)!!ğŸ˜‚ Fir to bhai antakshri ho ya dumbsharades, tera room hi adda hota tha apna, ya fir rishu ke room ki bhooto ki baate!! Kya maje the bhai Actor ban ja bhai tu chhor ye sab khaa engineering me fas gayaa!!ğŸ˜
Teri or rishu ki wajah se bhai mech ke courses aasani se paas ho gaye bhai, Assignments karte karte or mech ke â€˜Jerkâ€™ profs ko gaaliya dete dete hi 4 saal itne jaldi pure ho gaye bhai pta hi nahi chalaa!!!
Last year ki badminton me tujhe haraanağŸ˜œ or tere room ka wo session to bhai epic tha!
â€œFir â€˜Sintexâ€™ ki tanki ke paas sutte ke kass ke saath wo baatein, 
or is ek mahine me daaru se lekar apni yaari ki yaadein!â€
Bhoolne layak to tu insaan hi nahi hai!  
Treat to tune aaj tak di nahi! To wo to pending hai ki kitni saari, or 3rd year me jo trip plan karke nahi ja paaye the, ek to banti hai yaar! Or karenge bhi!! Tu bas mil to bhaai!ğŸ¤— 
Bahut cool or chaapu banda hai bhai tu, aise saamne tareef ki nahi sober hoke teri par bhai tu bc Gamer, actor, dancer, researcher, badminton player aur bc kya kya bolu, pura allrounder hai bhai tu!!â¤ï¸
Bakchod to tu hai hi, Baaki to ab aise hi chaapte rahein, Gym karte rahein or bas dosti asie hi bnaye rkhein!! Me dinesh bhakar(iyo) aapse fir milta rhunga kisi nayi jagah, fir kuchh naye kisse, kuchh nayi yaadein bnane ke liye, tab tak Yahin(DMs me) hoon me, yahin hoon meâ€¦ kahi na gayaa tujhe chhodke me!â¤ï¸
PS: Bas bhai ye yaad rkhna ki â€œSeeng nahi hote lomdi ke!!â€ or chahe kuchh ho jaye â€œgharwalo pe mat jana!!â€ ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£
